new-mocha.description: New Mocha a rich  brown where chocolate meets latte.

orangeade.description: Orangeade is a sunny light orange.

oyster.description: Oyster is a beige with the slight cloudy undertone.

parchment.description: Parchment a warm milky coffee color.

passion-purple.description: Passion Purple a regal shade of purple.

platinum.description: Platinum a gentle light gray to sooth any environment.

pumpkin.description: Pumpkin is a bright happy orange tone.

rust.description: Rust a warm brown, root beer tone.

sage.description: Sage is a deep celadon green.

sea.description: Sea is a vibrant light royal blue.

seafoam.description: Seafoam a greenish blue with an undercurrent of gray.

sky.description: Sky a pop of dramatic dark sky blue.

stone.description: Stone is a medium gray with an olive green undercast.

sunshine.description: Sunshine is a bright light creamy yellow.

tidepool.description: Tidepool a icy blue, tropical tone.

tomato.description: Tomato is a light red with a subtle orange cast.

turquoise.description: Turquoise  a blue green blend to remind you of the Caribbean.

white.description: White the brightest and cleanest white.

bankers-gray.description: Banker’s Gray is a rich textued gray color in a matte finish. This panel harkins images of the fine mens suit that grace board rooms, investment baks, and stock exchanges.

bronze-linen.description: Bronze Linen features a textured cross hatch face that gives the appearance of a fabric delicately woven with bronze and gold strands of thread.

brushed-steel.description: Brushed Steel has a high gloss finish over subtle metallic silver brush strokes.

bubble-gum-crok.description: Bubble Gum Crok presentsa bright pink high gloss appearence on a textured crocadile pattern.

butter-cream.description: Butter Cream has a high gloss finish over a delectable creamy tone.

candy-apple.description: Candy Apple is a bright glossy light red.

carbon.description: Carbon is a rich matte black finish with subtle texturing to create depth along with highs and lows along the black spectrum.

cottage.description: Cottage features a super matte finish with wood grain texture. It presents as a raw, plank of rich French oak in a creamy natural blond color with white highlights in the soft grain.

drift-cloth.description: Drift Cloth has a high gloss finish over a pattern reminiscent of a faded canvas sail or light linen pants. The breezy bone color given depth by a light gray stitch.

earth.description: Earth is compilation of high gloss slices of earth tone wood grains. The soothing palett includes warm browns, chestnut,taupe, carmel, drift wood, dark espresso, camel and blond tones.

french-roast.description: French Roast  has a high gloss brazilian walnut appearance with the rich, warm tones of Columbian coffee beans and contrasting dark espresso striations.

glass-drift.description: Glass Drift has the feel of a weatherd piece of gray driftwood but with a formal high gloss finish. Dark, medium, and light gray tones defined by delicate black wood grain markings.

gotham-stone.description: Gotham Stone has the look and feel of a chisled piece of flat textured gray stone.

graphite-reign.description: Graphite Reign  is a deep, cool shade of metalic charcoal gray with a high gloss finish.

gray-flannel.description: Gray Flannel is a rich smooth high gloss gray color. This panel reveals perfectly defined cross hatching similar to those found in the finest gray flanel suits.

gray-mist.description: Silver Mist has a high gloss silver finish over faint  metalic specs and etched lines.

key-lime-pie.description: Keylime Pie is a bright vibrant lime green with a high gloss finish.

melted-chocolate.description: Melted Chocolate is a high gloss reflection of an exotic wood. Its warm milk chocolate tones with light highlights are contrasted by dark striations of esprersso.

midnight-crok.description: Midnight Crok presents as a crocadile pattern with a patent leather sheen.

parchment.description: Parchment has a high gloss finish over a licht creamy white color with faint taup and grey lines that take the finish to a warmer tan feel.

pearl-stardust.description: Pearl Stardust a  bright white, metalic finish provides a shimmer and spakle under a high gloss finish.

pewter-rain.description: Pewter Rain has a high gloss finish over a field of fine metalic silver lines and periodic burn thriugh to reveal slight contrast.

pure-snow.description: Pure Snow has a soft, smooth, matte finish in pure white.

purple-reign.description: Purple Reign is a deep, rich and soothing shade of metalic purple with a high gloss finish.

ravenwood.description: Ravenwood features thick striations of black, white and multiple shades of gray. A slight shimmer brings the strands alive under a gloss finish.

raw-dusk.description: Raw Dusk features a super matte finish with wood grain texture with suble horizontal waves. This presents as a raw, aged plank of rich walnut in mauve and brown tones.

sahara.description: Sahara is a high gloss reflection of an exotic blond wood featuring layers of butterscotch, rich brown molassas earth tones, and gentle black striations.

sand-dune.description: Sand Dune is a high gloss reflection of warm blond, sun soaked sands that meet the ocean.

serengeti.description: Serengeti is a high gloss reflection of the warm sunset tones of the African plains. Brown, red, orange and black striations

shades-of-gray.description: Shades Of Gray  is craeted with a series of of wide high gloss lines of various shades of gray to black.

silky-putty.description: Silky Putty is a smooth super matte finish that carries a beautiful taupe with a warm buff tone.

silver-mist.description: Silver Mist has a high gloss silver finish over faint  metalic specs and etched lines.

snow-crok.description: Snow Crok presents as a crocadile pattern with in a pure white patent leather sheen.

snow-trees.description: Snow Trees carries clean tones of pure white. The tone-on-tone design features a matte textured background with a gloss overlay of a web of branches.

stainless-twist.description: Stainless Twist is textured panel with rich streams of matte grays and high sheen silver hues with a thread of perrywinkle.

stardust.description: Stardust has a gloss finish that carries a series of charcoal, silver and black lines that appear to cover a field of shimmer diamonds.

stealth.description: Stealth has a smooth super matte finish that carries a bold and soothing solid gray tone.

sunset-brown.description: Sunset Brown carries a flat finish with a textured face. The warm brown tones include an undercurrent of copper, red and orange.

twisted-steel.description: Twisted Steel is highgloss panel with wide tristed strandss of grays with hint of white shadows.

urban-cowboy.description: Urban Cowboy is a rich high gloss finish with subtle figuring reminicent of a supple worn leather. The warm brown tones carry a light and pleasing value with a slight sparkle to provide a faint metalic feel.
